## skupper unexpose

Unexpose a set of pods previously exposed through a Skupper address

### Synopsis

Unexpose a set of pods previously exposed through a Skupper address

```
skupper unexpose [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --address string   Skupper address the target was exposed as
  -h, --help             help for unexpose
```
